revisionDesc.change: General - Renamed. Must be checked carefully against the edition before finalization.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;2;48' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/zpe;193;235'

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Line A1, -> <#ἥμισυ=1/2#>; same in l. B4; in line A4, <#ἡμίσους=1/2#>; same in B17 (and add a space after it). Line a4, in the alt -> (μ̣[υ(ριάδ )]) [.?]. As Sosin said, but with a twist to follow the editors, at the end of fragment A -> "10. vestig [.?] 11. lost.2lin". There should be no further line missing at the top of fragment B (place of the fragments is nearly certain thanks to the recto). Line B10 -> ε̣ω̣ς̣ .5σ̣οι[.?] (or ε̣ω̣σ̣.5σ̣οι[.?]). Line B12, no space before π.2. Add [.?] at the start of B13 and B16. Line B17, I agree with {υ̣}. Delete line B19bis, not B19 (as mistakenly written by Sosin).

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Lin1 dbl sq brackets messed up--> 〚τ̣ων〛 (finalizer: be sure to use proper dbl sq brackets; lin.a5--> [χρόνον ][.?]; lin.a8--> .2[.4].2ν̣α̣σ̣[.?]; after a10 there isn't really a vac there (see plate): del. after lin 10--> 10. lost.?lin; FrB before lin1--> 1. lost.?lin; lin.b3--> (|πεπ̣ε̣ι̣σ̣|); lin.b5--> [.?][ το]ῦ; after b11--> 11. vac.1lin; linb14--> vestig [.?]|alt:|μ̣έ̣ρ̣ο̣υ̣σ̣[.?]; lin.b17: the upsilon does not appear erased to me, but rather started and abandoned, better--> {υ̣}; lin.b18bis,md. delete; lin.b19--> 〚τῶν〛 \ἀνδραπόδων/ (finalizer: be sure to use correct dbl sq brackets); lin.b19 delete; lin.b20--> [.?] 〚[απο]δημιαν〛 \[.?][κα]λ̣ῆι αἱρέσει/ (finalizer: be sure to use correct dbl sq brackets)
Entered text of P.AmmonII 48 from digital copy proofread against print edition
